flavor: If everything in the Gurmag Swamp hungers for human flesh, what bait could be more effective?

foreign_names.flavor: Wenn alles im Gurmag-Sumpf nach menschlichem Fleisch hungert, welcher Köder könnte dann effektiver sein?
foreign_names.name: Gurmag-Anglerfisch
foreign_names.text: Wühlen (Mit jeder Karte, die du aus deinem Friedhof ins Exil schickst, während du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst, bezahlst du {1} seiner Kosten.)

foreign_names.flavor: Si en el pantano Gurmag todo ansía hincarle el diente a la carne humana, ¿cuál es el cebo más efectivo?
foreign_names.name: Pescador del Gurmag
foreign_names.text: Excavar. (Cada carta que exilies de tu cementerio al lanzar este hechizo cuenta como un pago de {1}.)

foreign_names.flavor: Si tous les êtres du marais de Gurmag ont faim de chair humaine, quel appât serait plus efficace ?
foreign_names.name: Baudroie de Gurmag
foreign_names.text: Fouille (Chaque carte que vous exilez depuis votre cimetière en lançant ce sort paie {1}.)

foreign_names.flavor: Se tutto nella Palude di Gurmag è affamato di carne umana, quale esca potrebbe essere più efficace di questa?
foreign_names.name: Rana Pescatrice di Gurmag
foreign_names.text: Esumare (Ogni carta che esili dal tuo cimitero mentre lanci questa magia corrisponde al pagamento di {1}.)

foreign_names.flavor: グルマグ沼にいるすべての存在が人の肉を欲するのであれば、これ以上効果的なおとりがあるだろうか？
foreign_names.name: グルマグのアンコウ
foreign_names.text: 探査（この呪文を唱える段階であなたがあなたの墓地から追放した各カードは、{1}を支払う。）

foreign_names.flavor: 거마그 늪에 사는 모든 생물이 인간을 먹고 싶어 한다면, 가장 좋은 미끼가 과연 무엇이겠는가?
foreign_names.name: 거마그 아귀
foreign_names.text: 파헤치기 (이 주문을 발동하는 동안 당신이 당신의 무덤에서 추방하는 카드는 {1}을 지불한다.)

foreign_names.flavor: Se tudo no Pântano Grumag tem fome de carne humana, qual isca poderia ser mais eficiente?
foreign_names.name: Pescador Grumag
foreign_names.text: Esquadrinhar (Cada card que você exila de seu cemitério quando conjura esta mágica paga por {1}.)

foreign_names.flavor: Если все обитатели болота Гурмаг обожают человеческую плоть, то какая приманка может быть лучше этой?
foreign_names.name: Гурмагский Удильщик
foreign_names.text: Выкапывание (Каждая карта, которую вы изгоняете из вашего кладбища при разыгрывании этого заклинания, считается оплатой {1}.)

foreign_names.flavor: 如果谷尔玛沼泽里所有东西都想吃人肉，还有比它更有效的饵吗？
foreign_names.name: 谷尔玛钓客
foreign_names.text: 掘穴（你于施放此咒语时每从你坟墓场中放逐一张牌，就能为此咒语支付{1}。）

foreign_names.flavor: 如果谷爾瑪沼澤裡所有東西都想吃人肉，還有比它更有效的餌嗎？
foreign_names.name: 谷爾瑪釣客
foreign_names.text: 掘穴（你於施放此咒語時每從你墳墓場中放逐一張牌，就能為此咒語支付{1}。）

name: Gurmag Angler
original_text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

rulings.text: You exile cards from your graveyard at the same time you pay the spell’s cost. Exiling a card this way is simply another way to pay that cost.
Delve doesn’t change a spell’s mana cost or converted mana cost. For example, the converted mana cost of Tasigur’s Cruelty (with mana cost {5}{B}) is 6 even if you exile three cards to cast it.
You can’t exile cards to pay for the colored mana requirements of a spell with delve.
You can’t exile more cards than the generic mana requirement of a spell with delve. For example, you can’t exile more than five cards from your graveyard to cast Tasigur’s Cruelty.
Because delve isn’t an alternative cost, it can be used in conjunction with alternative costs.

text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
